title: Did the person who died have assets in another name
question: Did {deceasedName} have assets in another name?
legend: Did the person who died have assets in another name?
paragraph1: This could be shares or property that they held in their maiden name or nickname. They might also have used a different spelling or missed out some parts of their name.

required.summary: You haven’t answered the question about assets being held in another name
required.message: Select yes if the person who died had assets in another name
